alert.note: Alert for Coastal Harris; Inland Harris; Montgomery (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 4:50AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Montgomery and northeastern Harris Counties through 515 AM CDT... At 450 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Spring, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Humble, Greater Greenspoint, Spring, Aldine, Northside / Northline, Kingwood, The Woodlands, Bush Intercontinental Airport, Eastex / Jensen Area, East Houston, Hurricane Harbor Splashtown, Hidden Valley, Acres Home, Independence Heights, Porter Heights, East Little York / Homestead, Houston Gardens, southwestern Atascocita, Central Northwest and Sheldon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
